thread.title: Felipe Guardiola

author: Felipe Guardiola
title: Felipe Guardiola
text: Repeating hire with Goldcar. Pay attention to the holds on your card for the cheapest of options, also the costs of paying for the gas, which you have to pay on arrival before taking the car, about 70 Euros for a full tank. Also pay attention to taking a queue ticket when arriving to the Goldcar booth. Everything reasonable and to be expected, but the website might not tell you.
